List of all CRAN events (new, updated, archived packages)

Source: R/crandb-public-api.R, R/print.R
cran_events.Rd

List of all CRAN events (new, updated, archived packages)

cran_events(releases = TRUE, archivals = TRUE, limit = 10, from = 1)

# S3 method for cran_event_list
summary(object, ...)

# S3 method for cran_event_list
print(x, ...)

Arguments

releases

Whether to include package releases.

archivals

Whether to include package archivals.

limit

Number of events to list.

from

Where to start the list, for pagination.

object

Object to summarize.

...

Additional arguments are ignored currently.

x

Object to print.

Value

List of events.

Examples

cran_events()
#> CRAN events (events)-----------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When    Package      Version Title                                          
#>  - 2 hours text2sdg     0.1.3   Detecting UN Sustainable Development Goals i...
#>  - 2 hours skpr         1.1.4   Design of Experiments Suite: Generate and Ev...
#>  - 2 hours portalr      0.3.9   Create Useful Summaries of the Portal Data     
#>  - 2 hours mptools      1.0.1   RAMAS Metapop Tools                            
#>  - 2 hours mRpostman    1.0.0   An IMAP Client for R                           
#>  - 2 hours jmvReadWrite 0.3.2   Read and Write 'jamovi' Files ('.omv')         
#>  - 2 hours OpasnetUtils 1.3     Opasnet Modelling Environment Utility Functi...
#>  - 2 hours BullsEyeR    0.2.0   Topic Modelling                                
#>  - 2 hours arabicStemR  1.2     Arabic Stemmer for Text Analysis               
#>  + 3 hours TrenchR      0.1.0   Tools for Microclimate and Biophysical Ecolo...
cran_events(limit = 5, releases = FALSE)
#> CRAN events (archivals)--------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When    Package   Version Title                                             
#>  - 2 hours text2sdg  0.1.3   Detecting UN Sustainable Development Goals in T...
#>  - 2 hours skpr      1.1.4   Design of Experiments Suite: Generate and Evalu...
#>  - 2 hours portalr   0.3.9   Create Useful Summaries of the Portal Data        
#>  - 2 hours mptools   1.0.1   RAMAS Metapop Tools                               
#>  - 2 hours mRpostman 1.0.0   An IMAP Client for R                              
cran_events(limit = 5, archivals = FALSE)
#> CRAN events (pkgreleases)------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When    Package    Version Title                                            
#>  + 3 hours TrenchR    0.1.0   Tools for Microclimate and Biophysical Ecology   
#>  + 3 hours renderthis 0.1.0   Render Slides to Different Formats               
#>  + 3 hours RGMM       1.1.0   Robust Mixture Model                             
#>  + 3 hours lessR      4.2.2   Less Code, More Results                          
#>  + 3 hours tidymodels 1.0.0   Easily Install and Load the 'Tidymodels' Packa...
summary(cran_events(limit = 10))
#> CRAN events (events)
#>  [1] "text2sdg@0.1.3-"     "skpr@1.1.4-"         "portalr@0.3.9-"     
#>  [4] "mptools@1.0.1-"      "mRpostman@1.0.0-"    "jmvReadWrite@0.3.2-"
#>  [7] "OpasnetUtils@1.3-"   "BullsEyeR@0.2.0-"    "arabicStemR@1.2-"   
#> [10] "TrenchR@0.1.0"
